valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Sun 11 Jan 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 12 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Developing Atlantic low moving steadily northeastwards, expected Hebrides 963 by 0600 tomorrow
